project.name: DVD Store Unattended Coding Test
project.description:
This was part of the recruitment process for an organization in the United Kingdom. At the time it was the first one I had been given. The unattended coding test is an attempt to evaluate a number of developer skills and as well as the processes a developer uses.
In this problem you are required to complete the implementation of the DvdService interface, a simple service that contains two methods.
Reference implementations DvdRepository and the Dvd are included in the pack; any of the supplied files may be changed as you see fit.
